patterns: My head hurts on one side

responses: These could be signs of a migraine. Resting in a dark, quiet room often helps. Ibuprofen or Acetaminophen might provide relief.
Migraines can be debilitating. Try to avoid triggers and rest. If vision changes or speech issues occur, seek medical help.

patterns: I feel cramps in my abdomen
responses: Stomach pain can have many causes. Avoid solid foods for a few hours and stick to clear fluids. If the pain is severe, persistent, or accompanied by vomiting/blood, see a doctor immediately.
For mild stomach aches, try peppermint tea or a heating pad. If it is sharp lower-right pain (appendix) or severe, go to the ER.
